title: Command set extension manifest
description: A client-side extension that defines a set of custom commands that can be shown in a menu, tool bar, etc.

extensionType.title: Client-side Extension Type
extensionType.description: For a command set, the extension type must be one of these values: ListViewCommandSet

items.title: Items
items.description: A table of items defined by this command set. The object key is the Item ID. The Item ID is a unique identifier that event handlers use to recognize the item. The identifier must consist of upper-case letters, numbers, and underscores. Example: "SHOW_INFO"

title.title: Title
title.description: A short label to be displayed by the associated button, menu item, etc. Example: "Show information"

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of the item. Currently only "command" is allowed.

ariaLabel.title: ARIA Label
ariaLabel.description: Custom accessibility text for the browser's "aria-label" attribute.  If omitted, the title property will be used by default.

iconImageUrl.title: Icon Image URL
iconImageUrl.description: An optional URL for an image to be displayed next to the item. The requirements for this image are defined by the type of extension; some extension types may not display the image at all.
